name: Experto Custom Dashboard – Custom Dashboard, Dashboard Customization, Dashboard, My Account Plugin
author: UX Design Experts

sections.description:
Enhance Your WooCommerce Store Dashboard Design & Custom Blocks for Great Customer Experience.

1 PLUGIN to style & customize your WooCommerce dashboard to give it an attractive look.

Elevate the visual appeal of your WooCommerce dashboard and create a captivating user journey with Experto Custom Dashboard. Our team of UX experts has meticulously crafted this powerful plugin to provide an exceptional and tailored dashboard experience for your visitors.

With Experto Custom Dashboard, you can customize the appearance of your dashboard, ensuring that it reflects your brand and entices users. Additionally, you have the flexibility to add custom blocks on the dashboard’s home screen, allowing for increased visibility of essential operational, marketing, and support elements.

Experience the ultimate solution for your website’s requirements with Experto Custom Dashboard — a standout choice amidst the vast selection of over 55,000 plugins available on WordPress.org. Bid farewell to mundane WooCommerce dashboards and welcome a customized solution exclusively designed to cater to your customers’ needs.

With a custom WooCommerce dashboard, you have the ability to:

  1. Customize Appearance: Personalize the look and feel of your dashboard to align with your brand identity and create a visually appealing interface.
  2. Add Custom Blocks: Integrate custom blocks on the dashboard’s home screen to showcase important information, such as sales data, order status, inventory updates, or promotional offers.
  3. Enhance User Experience: Create a delightful user experience by organizing and presenting relevant information in a user-friendly manner, allowing customers to navigate and access key features effortlessly.
  4. Streamline Operations: Optimize your dashboard to streamline business operations by providing quick access to essential tools and functionalities, such as inventory management, order processing, and customer support.
  5. **Tailor to Customer Needs:* Adapt the dashboard to cater to specific customer requirements, ensuring a personalized experience that addresses their unique preferences and needs.

Remember, a custom WooCommerce dashboard empowers you to optimize the user experience, streamline operations, monitor performance, and tailor your store to meet the needs of your customers effectively.

Elevate your website’s engagement and drive more conversions with Experto Custom Dashboard Plugin, developed by the #1 Website Design company in Denver. Don’t wait, try it today and experience the difference!

sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire ‘Experto Custom Dashboard’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory or search for “Experto Custom Dashboard Plugin” on WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will find ‘Experto Custom Dashboard’ or ‘CWD’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  4. Once you are on the Experto Custom Dashboard or ‘CWD’ admin panel, you can edit and change the text, fonts, colors and url of dashboard, and dashboard boxes then click save.
  5. Choose development mode first so you can test and edit your CTA first. Development mode will only show to admins who are logged in. Live will show to everyone.
  6. Go to ‘My Account’ page and set template to CWD Template.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin transform your WooCommerce my-account page into brand new dashboard area for your customers.

Will this plugin have customization option?

Yes, you can change colors, font sizes, and even you can add or remove dahboard main page items.

Can I add new menu items and remove existing menu items in WooCommerce my-account page ?

In future yes. We are working hard to provide that feature to you.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Brand new icon set added.
  • Adding removing items functionality added to my-account dashboard page.
  • Bug fixes and added dependency on WooCommerce plugin

0.5.0

  • Intial release.
